product_name: ANUA8 Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizing Gentle Gel Cleanser
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganSustainable PackagingAnua 8 Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizing Gentle Gel Cleanser is a gel-to-foam cleanser infused with Glycerin, Ceramides, Ectoin and Squalane that doesn't strip skin after cleansing and delivers long lasting hydration for sensitive skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsGentle, non-drying gel cleanser that hydrates and moisturizesFor sensitive skinFree Of: Denatured Alcohols / Parabens / Artificial Color / Silicones / Sulfates / Mineral Oil / Methylchloroisothiazolinone / Methylisothiazolinone / Coal Tar Dyes / NutsKey Ingredients8 Hyaluronic Acid and Glycerin: Provides long-lasting hydration and helps to lock in moistureCeramides: Moisturizes and helps maintain a healthy moisture barrier, while cleansing impuritesEctoin: Soothes irritated skin and helps maintain skin hydration and a healthy moisture balanceSqualane: Balances out oil production, keeping the skin smooth and softResearch ResultsPrimary skin irritation test completed on sensitive skin72-hour moisture retention evaluation (improvement in skin moisture immediately after use and 72 hours after use compared to before use)17.58% reduction in redness* after one use (*Redness due to dryness, not associated with any disease.)Item 2634276How To UseApply an adequate amount of cleanser.Create enough foam and gently massage your entire face.Use as the second step of your double cleansing routine after using a cleansing oil.Can be used every day, AM & PM.IngredientsWater, Coco-Betaine, Sodium Cocoyl Alaninate, Potassium Cocoyl Glycinate, Acrylates Copolymer, Glycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Propanediol, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate, Caprylyl Glycol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Tromethamine, Glyceryl Glucoside, Disodium EDTA, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Squalane, Ectoin, Citric Acid, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein, Maltodextrin, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Ceramide NP, Butylene Glycol, Hyaluronic Acid, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Potassium Hyaluronate, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate.
how_to_use: Apply an adequate amount of cleanser.Create enough foam and gently massage your entire face.Use as the second step of your double cleansing routine after using a cleansing oil.Can be used every day, AM & PM.

reviews.headline: never using a cream cleanser again!
reviews.comments: This was my first time using a gel cleanser and let me tell you, I was blown away. My skin felt so nourished the minute this was on. So lightweight and hydrating. Love love love love that! As a sensitive skin girly, it's extremely gentle and is absolute magic if used as directed (after an oil cleanser).

reviews.headline: Cleanser that hydrates, but doesnt clean
reviews.comments: Leaves skin soft because ita hydrating, but maybe because it doesn't clean. It's a cleanser that doesn't clean very well. Always have to go heavily on the micellar water to get the rest of my makeup off.

reviews.headline: Saved my skin
reviews.comments: As someone with combination, acne-prone, super sensitive skin this really saved my skin. Has not broken my skin out once. I use this and their glow milky toner and have noticed such an improvement in my skin barrier, skin texture, and acne in less than 3 weeks.

reviews.headline: Improved my skin texture!
reviews.comments: I have oily sensitive skin and have been using the same face wash for years, but it was out of stock everywhere, so I got this one and my skin has improved so much over the few weeks I've been using it! My redness on my cheeks is better and the texture of my skin is so much smoother!

reviews.headline: Safe for Sensitive/Acne Skin!
reviews.comments: OMG!!! I have sensitive, acne-prone skin that is dry and gets perioral dermatitis. Vanicream is my go to cleanser but I have been looking for something more hydrating. Ive been using this for a month and theres no irritation at all, it truly cleans my skin, and leaves it so soft! HIGHLY recommend!

reviews.headline: Amazing.
reviews.comments: This product is truly so moisturizing and cleared my skin up so much.

rollup.name: 8 Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizing Gentle Gel Cleanser
